arts.ttl: PSG vs Atalanta – Official lineups: Kvaratskhelia starts, not Ramos!
arts.sum: This Wednesday at the Parc des Princes, Paris Saint-Germain will face Atalanta in the first matchday of the 2025-2026 UEFA Champions League (kick-off at 9:00 PM, CET). arts.ttl: Champions League Liveblog: Ajax vs. Inter and PSG vs. Atalanta
PSG vs Atalanta – Watch the Paris pre-match live
arts.sum: This Wednesday, for the first matchday of the 2025-2026 Champions League season, Paris Saint-Germain will face Atalanta at the Parc des Princes. Kick-off is at 9:00 PM CET, but the club invites fans to join them for pre-match coverage, including live footage of the players’ warm-up, starting at 7:45 PM. Watch the live stream here:

arts.ttl: PSG/Atalanta – Juric is looking forward to facing the “best teams”
